duties_responsibilities.duty: Facilitate group counseling sessions, educational programs, and lectures to assist clients in meeting therapeutic goals.
Provide crises intervention, support & guidance, and address client behaviors and personal problems through individual counseling.
Document clients’ progress and responses to treatment, while ensuring complete, accurate, and up-to-date client records.
Monitor clients in medication self-administration and ensure client safety and well-being during social, recreational, or daily activities.
Enforce house rules, schedule client appointments, transport clients, and maintain the vehicle.
Collect urine samples, administer breathalyzer, and perform other assigned duties.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalency required. Minimum 6 months of previous experience in substance abuse or mental health counseling required. Related work experience with program specific population (adolescent/adult) in a residential treatment setting required.
